entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 10:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -10.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -18.2°C
Wind: N 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
